title: Stepping into Wout’s Shoes: Thibau Nys Is Belgium’s Best Hope for CX Worlds and Its Next Multi-Discipline Megastar
content:
'It's not impossible against Mathieu': Could the 21-year-old starlet and 'son of Sven' stun MVDP in Tábor?

Read the full article at Stepping into Wout’s Shoes: Thibau Nys Is Belgium’s Best Hope for CX Worlds and Its Next Multi-Discipline Megastar on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
